name: WETAMAN: ONCE UPON A WINTER
description:
WETAMAN: ONCE UPON A WINTER is a 3D action point and click game. The game is set in a city environment, in winter time.

The main character is a hero who transform to Wetaman to defend the city from the winter attack of Lord Disease. The main character also has a motorbike that can fly called Beetle Battle Bike to assist him.
